argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Water leak in roof leading to mold and habitability issues in garage and living room
argumentsAndDecisions.violatedCode: Civil Code Section 1941.1(a)(1), Health & Safety Code Section 17920.3(a)(13)
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, notified on multiple occasions in December 2022
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Photographic evidence showed visual discoloration, mold presence confirmed through testimony and documentation
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Elderly tenant unable to use living room and garage due to mold conditions
